Reviews.Title: HTC Inspire 4g Unlocked Android Red Phone is yet my favorite.
Reviews.Author: Rosita, Florida
Reviews.Content: I bought from Amazon.com my HTC Inspire 4g on Jan.2012, and to this day is the best phone i have...I have a 3g Iphone, 4g Iphone, Dell Venue phone, Samsung Galaxy(gave it to a friend)and I always go back to My HTC Inspire 4g. After I cut my sim card to a mini size for my Iphone 4, I taped the sim card to the original size and placed it back on my HTC Inspire for which is the phone I am presently using. It has all the apps that I downloaded for free,Good GPS,good music,games,great photos,great wallpapers,etc.,etc.I truely Love my HTC Inspire 4g Unlocked phone.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE!!!
Reviews.Author: Cell Guy
Reviews.Content: Loved the phone I am using it on Walmart's straight talk and I have not had any problems with the phone. Everything works and has been that way.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: SARYA
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my phone.. don't had for like 5 months now an haven't had any complications.. it came through the mail on time, everything was perfect! Just need a new case.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: jen
Reviews.Content: Have this phone couple weeks now and its the best phone I've had to date. My only pet peeve is you can't use your music download as a ringtone or notification. hence the reason on ly four stars.All in all phone was a good buy. Got no problem with it

Reviews.Title: HTC INSPIRE 4G CELL UNLOCKED
Reviews.Author: Stacey
Reviews.Content: This phone was bought for my teenage daughter and has been nothing but wonderful. She is VERY picky and is more than pleased with her cell.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: minecraftrules
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife because we switched to straight talk, and I wanted to get her a good smart phone. It is a good smart phne, and worked with the straight talk talk and text. The data does not work though because you cannot change the APN setting. I wish the third party seller; BREED, had been more forthright about this in there advertising. I will be returning the phone and looking elsewhere. I am not so sure I will make this particular kind of purchase on amazon as well.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Mark Dougherty
Reviews.Content: I bought this pone for myself and love it. The shipping was quick. It was easy to set up through my Straight Talk account and I haven't had any problems using it. I even download books to read on it. The seller was great to work with. I do find the phone a little heavy, but for what I use it for it work and runs great. Thank you for such a wonderful experience with a better phone. Screen is large enough for different activities and it has a great camera with flash. It's is quick and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: TERRIBLE PHONE.
Reviews.Author: C0URTN3YLYN
Reviews.Content: This phone seemed great, but after only two weeks of use, it completely stopped working.It wasn't dropped, it had no water damage, it was in perfect condition. And out of nowhere, it turned off and won't turn back on. It won't even charge.This phone is definitely not worth all the trouble.

Reviews.Title: Cell phone cover
Reviews.Author: Thomas E. Lewis
Reviews.Content: This cover is a two piece snap on cover. It fits the phone exactly. Not all covers fit as well as this one does. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Alain Danel "AFD"
Reviews.Content: More important for me is the life of the battery.I used this phone  in a normal environment, and the battery after 3 to 4 cycles became in full shape and now last 9 hours +.On top, the phone is superb and works really well.One small negative point is that it comes as an AT&T; unit with pre loaded AT&T; apps that I do not need and that can not be removed.Not a major point, just a irritant.I give 5 stars with pleasure.

Reviews.Title: ok phone
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: a little slow updating but other than that it was a very good phone and reliable. makes for a great backup phone

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: marlitt tippetts
Reviews.Content: thank you buy it in usa and brought it on my trip to peru works perfectly well here in Peru, thanks for all the smartphone 100% effective

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Karen Banfield
Reviews.Content: Great look.  very sensitive to  the touch. Love all of  the features but the battery life is not the best.

Reviews.Title: VERY NICE PHONE
Reviews.Author: harris61
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A AWESOME PHONE,I DON'T HAVE ANY PROBLEMS WITH THE PHONE ,JUST THE CHARGER WHEN IT WAS RECEIVED IT WAS LOOSEN,OTHERWISE I WOULD PREFER THIS PHONE 100%...

Reviews.Title: great phone for the price
Reviews.Author: kansay
Reviews.Content: Receive the item as expected. The phone looks good with no scratches and works out of the box. The down side is that I wish that they would of delete the AT&T; apps that was in there so that it could make more space for the internal memory. Will order again if they have newer phones.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: claudia medina
Reviews.Content: nice very happy , i choose because is my favorite, i like to much and i recommende 100 porcent .

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jahlil Aaron Gage
Reviews.Content: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM I PAID 201.34 DOLLARS FOR THIS PHONE AND IT DOESNT WORK!!! I PLUGGED IT UP TO THE CHARGERT PORT THROUGH THE WALL AND IT DIDNT CHARGE AT ALL! I'VE LET THE PHONE SIT ON THE CHARGER FOR HOURS AND IT TOLD ME MY PHONE IS ON 1% ENERGY I'M VERY CONVINCED THIS IS A SHAYDY COMPANY SO YOU GUYS DONT BUT ANY PRODUCT FROM THIS COMPANY UNLESS YOU WANT TO RECIEVE A DEFECTED PHONE JUST A FYI EVERYONE!!

ProductInfo.Features:
4.3" S-LCD capacitive multi-touchscreen w/ HTC Sense UI and Protective Corning Gorilla Glass
Dolby Mobile and SRS sound enhancement
Android OS v2.2 (Froyo) - upgradable to v2.3 (Gingerbread), Qualcomm MSM8255 Snapdragon chipset
8MP Camera (3264x 2448 pixels) w/ Autofocus, Dual-LED flash, Geo-tagging, face detection + Video
4 GB storage, 768 MB RAM + microSD slo expandable up to 32 GB
ProductInfo.Name: HTC Inspire 4G A9192 Unlocked GSM Smartphone w/ 8MP Camera - Red
